data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is an extension to SOAP::Lite (hence SOAP::MIME). Ultimately
    this module will be dropped once SOAP::Lite fully implements
    attachment support. I have already gotten feedback from Paul
    Kulchenko (maintainer of SOAP::Lite) and got his blessing. The
    version number of SOAP::MIME corresponds to the version number of
    SOAP::Lite that it patches.
